name: Emma/Tess
_source: s;Tess; Whoa lady!{c:move_portrait;Tess;Right} I am trying to get gold here, move!
s;Emma; You are stealing from innocent people!{w} I am giving you a chance to explain yourself{br}before I will use force!
s;Tess; Look stealing when people are fighting is my main goal here,{w} this is what poor people do for a living.
s;Emma; I understand that but still you can't.{w} I got a deal if you are willing to listen to it.
s;Tess; If you say the right words I will listen,{w} if not I will slash you with my sword.
s;Emma; My deal is if you work with us,{w} I will give you a life that doesn't involve stealing from innocents.
s;Tess; What is in it for me? How do i know that you won't go back on your word!
s;Emma; I never go back on my word, ask my partners.{w} Anyway I will give you the gold you need if you work for us.
s;Tess; Hmmm.... Alright I take you on your word,{w} but remember this if you go back on your word I will kill you, got it!
s;Emma; Alright lady geez calm down.{w}Welcome aboard!{w} (You crazy bitch...)
